description:
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection features implementations of
various classic puzzle games. Solve a randomly generated collection of
puzzles to unlock the boss puzzles and win.

v0.1.1-prealpha.description:
Hotfix for issues with world generation.

Web client: https://ishanpm.github.io/ap-sgtpuzzles-web/

AP world source code: https://github.com/ishanpm/Archipelago-sgtpuzzles/tree/d5d5972c3ac85976355bb9cecade2d75ff63613b/worlds/sgtpuzzles
v0.1.1-prealpha.title: v0.1.1-prealpha

v0.1.10-prealpha.description:
Advancing two version numbers because I realized I forgot to pull from upstream halfway through writing this release.

Changes:
- When playing puzzles from a multiworld, the "new game" hotkeys `N` and `Ctrl+N` are disabled in the backend, rather than the frontend. This will allow puzzles using the `N` key to work properly, such as particularly large Group or Solo puzzles.
- The "solve" hotkey is also disabled in the same circumstances. Sorry! (You can still force-solve puzzles by typing `solvePuzzle()` into the browser console.)
- Updated the base game, which brings in some nice improvements like allowing `Backspace` to clear cells in Filling.

There are no AP world changes in this update. I know about the manifest changes, I'll get to that soon.

Web client: https://ishanpm.github.io/ap-sgtpuzzles-web/

AP World source code: https://github.com/ishanpm/Archipelago-sgtpuzzles/tree/a385f92fa4eeb8f772b9edbf912e451d284788ea/worlds/sgtpuzzles
v0.1.10-prealpha.title: v0.1.10-prealpha

v0.1.11-prealpha.description:
Features:
- Same slot co-op is now supported! Solved puzzles are automatically stored on the Archipelago server and marked solved on all files which connect to the same slot. Simply connect with any existing savefile to sync its solved puzzles.
- The new `fixed_puzzles` option for the apworld lets you specify a list of puzzles to always place in a world, ignoring `genre_weights`. You can specify these puzzles as just a genre (in which case a preset will be chosen randomly as usual), or you can supply an options string or even a specific puzzle ID or seed.

Changes:
- Puzzles no longer regenerate from a seed if there's already save data for that puzzle. This means large puzzles will load much faster after you click "Save Puzzle Progress" for the first time. (In case there are any problems with loading the puzzle, you can delete these saves with the debug command `deletePuzzleData(index)`.)
- Added missing `6dh` and `6de` presets for Dominosa.
- Manifest added to apworld in preparation for Archipelago 0.7.

Web client: https://ishanpm.github.io/ap-sgtpuzzles-web/

AP World source code: https://github.com/ishanpm/Archipelago-sgtpuzzles/tree/e84c2da7ee7cad5d62d08228c077fe331b1e85fe/worlds/sgtpuzzles
v0.1.11-prealpha.title: v0.1.11-prealpha

v0.1.12-prealpha.description:
Changes:
- Fixed bug introduced in v0.1.11 where solved puzzles were sometimes marked solved on other slots when switching saves. Sorry to everyone who was affected by this!

Web client: https://ishanpm.github.io/ap-sgtpuzzles-web/

AP World source code: https://github.com/ishanpm/Archipelago-sgtpuzzles/tree/e84c2da7ee7cad5d62d08228c077fe331b1e85fe/worlds/sgtpuzzles
v0.1.12-prealpha.title: v0.1.12-prealpha

v0.1.13-prealpha.description:
Minor update, mostly for my own peace of mind.

Changes:
- Changed the storage key for co-op solves to include the player's team.
- The client now displays a version number at the bottom of the page. If it doesn't show 0.1.13, clear your browser cache. (Don't clear site data though, because that will erase your saves!)

Web client: https://ishanpm.github.io/ap-sgtpuzzles-web/

AP World source code: https://github.com/ishanpm/Archipelago-sgtpuzzles/tree/e84c2da7ee7cad5d62d08228c077fe331b1e85fe/worlds/sgtpuzzles
v0.1.13-prealpha.title: v0.1.13-prealpha

v0.1.14-prealpha.description:
Well this is awkward.

Changes:
- Solving already collected/released puzzles now syncs their co-op status
- Fixed critical bug introduced in last update
v0.1.14-prealpha.title: v0.1.14-prealpha

v0.1.15-prealpha.description:
Changes:
- Fixed a bug where puzzles would sometimes fail to save if solved while not connected to a server.
- When a connection is dropped, the file in the file selector now turns orange like it does for other connection errors.

No AP world update needed.

Web client: https://ishanpm.github.io/ap-sgtpuzzles-web/

AP World source code (v0.1.11): https://github.com/ishanpm/Archipelago-sgtpuzzles/tree/e84c2da7ee7cad5d62d08228c077fe331b1e85fe/worlds/sgtpuzzles
v0.1.15-prealpha.title: v0.1.15-prealpha

Fixes:

- Added missing presets for Mines

- Added missing presets for... something

Changes:

That's it.

v0.1.3-prealpha.description:
- The puzzle viewer is now resizable.
- The connection host field now defaults to the official Archipelago website. (In a future update, it will remember the last entered value.)
- The maximum puzzle count has been increased to 2000.
- More puzzles now have a rules summary.
- The world's built-in preset list now has each puzzle's original presets.
- The built-in preset list can be filtered by (somewhat arbitrarily chosen) difficulty values, globally or on a per-puzzle basis.
- Custom presets can now specify weights.
- Something might happen if you shift-click the "Freeplay" button...

Web client: https://ishanpm.github.io/ap-sgtpuzzles-web/

AP world source code: https://github.com/ishanpm/Archipelago-sgtpuzzles/tree/b113f102137b6c67b5e96982196783c8844850ed
v0.1.3-prealpha.title: v0.1.3-prealpha

v0.1.4prealpha.description:
Well I guess I might as well increment the version number.

Changes:
- Puzzle items now belong to an item group
- Genre weights no longer break when multiple sgtpuzzles worlds are in the same multiworld (hopefully)
- Minor tweaks to option help text
- Minor tweaks to genre presets

There are no changes to the web client for this release, since it's currently undergoing a large rewrite.

Web client: https://ishanpm.github.io/ap-sgtpuzzles-web/

AP World source code: https://github.com/ishanpm/Archipelago-sgtpuzzles/tree/9f7f57e9a1cff9f72a24e539450115d82049d35c/worlds/sgtpuzzles
v0.1.4prealpha.title: v0.1.4-prealpha

v0.1.5-prealpha.description:
Another hotfix before the rewrite!

Changes:
- Can now connect to hosts with a password
- Added a button to change the connection info of existing files

To change an existing file's connection info, load it, wait for the connection to fail, type the new connection info, then click "Reconnect current file". It's janky, I know. File management will be much more streamlined in the rewrite.

Web client: https://ishanpm.github.io/ap-sgtpuzzles-web/

AP World source code: https://github.com/ishanpm/Archipelago-sgtpuzzles/tree/9f7f57e9a1cff9f72a24e539450115d82049d35c/worlds/sgtpuzzles
v0.1.5-prealpha.title: v0.1.5-prealpha

v0.1.7-prealpha.description:
Minor update to fix some missing options in the world YAML. I noticed while writing this I skipped version 0.1.6, but I'm too lazy to fix that.

Changes:
- Client now checks world version in preparation for future world updates.
- Added missing `min_difficulty` and `max_difficulty` options to world option group.

Web client: https://ishanpm.github.io/ap-sgtpuzzles-web/

AP World source code: https://github.com/ishanpm/Archipelago-sgtpuzzles/tree/a385f92fa4eeb8f772b9edbf912e451d284788ea/worlds/sgtpuzzles
v0.1.7-prealpha.title: v0.1.7-prealpha

v0.1.8-prealpha.description:
Another maintenance release, mainly to pull in some changes from the original repository.

Changes:
- Updated the base game, which should fix some issues with Flood.
- archipelago.js has been updated to v2.0.4 for compatibility with Archipelago v0.6.2.
- Experimental support for touchscreen input. (Still no soft keyboard yet, sorry)

Web client: https://ishanpm.github.io/ap-sgtpuzzles-web/

AP World source code: https://github.com/ishanpm/Archipelago-sgtpuzzles/tree/a385f92fa4eeb8f772b9edbf912e451d284788ea/worlds/sgtpuzzles
v0.1.8-prealpha.title: v0.1.8-prealpha
